articles.description: The "High Quality Camera" unlocks a world of photography options for the Pi.

Attention tinkerers: Raspberry Pi has released a new camera for its tiny single-board computers. The "Raspberry Pi High Quality Camera" is on sale now for $50, and it will be sold alongside the older Raspberry Pi Camera Modul… [+3743 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Xbox Series X launch on schedule but game delays possible, Microsoft says - Polygon
articles.description: Xbox head Phil Spencer says Xbox Series X game production is an unknown as developers and publishers are forced to work from home due to the coronavirus pandemic.
articles.content: Microsofts next-generation console, the Xbox Series X, is still on schedule to launch this holiday season, according to Xbox head Phil Spencer. But the games that will launch with that system could see production delays, Spencer told CNBC in an interview on T… [+1630 chars]

articles.author: Gary Jones
articles.title: GTA 5 Online Alien Suit: How to get the Alien Suit and Baseball Bat in GTA Online - Express
articles.description: GTA 5 Online has a lot of players, and apparently, a lot of them are now enjoying buying Alien Suits and hunting down other GTA Online players. Here's how to get one and join in on the fun.

articles.title: PS Plus May 2020 PS4 Games Confirmed - Push Square
articles.description: Unfortunately, the leak was wrong
articles.content:
May 2020's PlayStation Plus games have been officially revealed. And no, sadly you're not getting Dying Light and Dark Souls Remastered, as was previously rumoured. This disappointment has already prompted one of the worst received months ever.

articles.author: Aaron Brown
articles.title: Samsung 4K and 8K TVs get three new channels for FREE, but there's a catch - Express
articles.description: SAMSUNG Smart TV owners can tune into three new channels for free without installing an extra app - or paying a penny for the new shows. However, these freebies are not available everywhere, so some 4K and 8K TV owners will miss out.
articles.content: Samsung Smart TV owners looking for something to watch while in lockdown will be able to tune into three new channels for free thanks to an update to the built-in Samsung TV Plus feature. For those who don't know, Samsung TV Plus is a completely free on-deman… [+1602 chars]
